document_data.name: Greymace
document_data.mainbody: '''Greymace''' was the majordomo for the noble [[Seasilver]] family of [[Marsember]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Greymace had a hooked nose with eyes that were set close to one another. He wore fine [[robe]]s of velvet, emblazoned with the sigil of House Seasilver.
document_data.Personality: Befitting his rank, Greymace had a commanding air that was evident every time he stepped into a room.
document_data.History: On [[Uktar 2]] of the {{yearlinkName|1486}}, the city of Marsember was assaulted by [[shade]]s during [[Netheril]]'s invasion of [[Cormyr]]. Greymace was able to accompany Grand Duke [[Farnig Seasilver]] aboard the ''[[Wave Wyvern]]'' during the conflict, sailing away from the city. Unfortunately, the Duke Seasilver was slain shortly thereafter, though Greymace's fate was unknown.
